channel.title: Posts on 浩瀚天空
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 浩瀚天空

item.title: 本地环境相关配置信息
item.description:
本地环境相关配置信息

 1local.rabbitmq.com
 2　　　brew services restart rabbitmq
 3　　　
 4
 5local.gitlab.com
 6　　　dockerdesktop 启动容器
 7    Personal Access Tokens: 
 8
 9
10local.harbors.com
11　　　dockerdesktop 启动容器
12　　　
13
14local.jenkins.com
15　　　brew services restart jenkins
16
17
18local.elasticsearch.com
19　　　4个node  
20　　　ljl-maci9  master 先启动(LaunchControl 里面启动elasticsearch服务) 
21　　　vm7-4 vm7-5 vm7-6  后启动
22
23local.elasticsearch-docker.com
24　　　dockerdesktop 启动容器
25　　　
26　　　
27local.kibana.com
28　　　LaunchControl 里面启动 kibana 服务
29
30local.kibana-docker.com
31　　　dockerdesktop 启动容器
32
33
34local.grafanas.com
35　　　brew services restart grafana
36　　　
37
38local.prometheus.com
39　　　brew services restart prometheus
40
41　　　
42local.jumpserver.com
43　　　dockerdesktop 启动容器
44
45
46local.k8sadmin.com
47　　　vm7-1  master 节点  先启动
48　　　vm7-2  node 节点  后启动
49　　　vm7-3  node 节点  后启动
50
51
52local.cacheadmin.com
53　　　ljl-maci9   nginx  /usr/local/opt/phpCacheAdmin
54qq邮箱的授权码
55　　　POP3/IMAP/SMTP/Exchange/CardDAV 授权码已生成
56　　　在第三方客户端登录时，密码框请输入以下授权码：
57　　　omoivzpoltzjhfjc
58
59
60Deepseek
61　　　API: sk-cdc80c986d6144a89560efde0695052d
62
63
64
65
66个人博客  博客项目源码路径：/Users/lijianlin/www/local/local.hugo.com
67本地域名：local.hugo.com
68（需要修改博客本地项目源码config/_default/hugo.toml中的baseurl，然后在终端里面先进入博客项目源码根目录，
69  然后执行：hugo -D；或者在phpstorm\Goland里面打开博客项目源码，修改config/_default/hugo.toml中的baseurl，
70  然后点击运行(需要安装好的Hugo Integration插件并且在项目运行中配置好hugo运行配置)）
71
72线上域名：jianlin-li.github.io
73博客项目本地git和github上的远程关联项目：https://github.com/JianLin-Li/local.hugo.com.git
74博客域名对应的github page项目：https://github.com/JianLin-Li/JianLin-Li.github.io.git
75
76新增博文步骤
77在本地博客项目源码	/Users/lijianlin/www/local/local.hugo.com/content/post 目录里面新增.md文件
78(最好是能在phpstorm\Goland中新建，在安装好hugo Integration插	件在IDE里面新建选择hugo new，这样新建的md会自动生成一些配置)，
79修改后提交，推送到GitHub远程main分支时触发github action，自动部署博文public目录到https://github.com/JianLin-Li/JianLin-Li.github.io.git

item.title: 罗茜公司相关脚本解决方案
item.description:
SQL文件编码修复工具

提示

修复UTF-8中文字符被错误解释为Latin-1导致的乱码问题，只替换单引号内的完整乱码字符串

  1<?php
  2/**
  3 * Desc:
  4 * Created by PhpStorm
  5 * Project: luoxi
  6 * File: sql_fixer.php
  7 * User: lijianlin
  8 * Date: 2025/10/16 上午11:10:42
  9 */
 10
 11
 12/**
 13 * SQL文件编码修复工具
 14 * 修复UTF-8中文字符被错误解释为Latin-1导致的乱码问题
 15 */
 16
 17/**
 18 * SQL文件编码修复工具
 19 * 修复UTF-8中文字符被错误解释为Latin-1导致的乱码问题
 20 * 改进版：只替换单引号内的完整乱码字符串
 21 */
 22
 23/**
 24 * SQL文件编码修复工具
 25 * 修复UTF-8中文字符被错误解释为Latin-1导致的乱码问题
 26 * 改进版：只替换单引号内的完整乱码字符串
 27 */
 28class SqlEncodingFixer
 29{
 30	private $encodingFixes = [
 31		'µ¼³ö' => '导出',

212		'ÓÃ»§ÃÜÂëÐÞ¸Ä' => '用户密码修改',
213		'ÓÃ»§Ò³Ãæ¼°¹¦ÄÜÊÚÈ¨' => '用户页面及功能授权',
214		'½ÇÉ«Ò³Ãæ¼°¹¦ÄÜÊÚÈ¨' => '角色页面及功能授权',
215		'°²È«Éó¼ÆÔ±²Ù×÷ÈÕÖ¾' => '安全审计员操作日志',
216		'ÏµÍ³¹ÜÀíÔ±²Ù×÷ÈÕÖ¾' => '系统管理员操作日志',
217		'°²È«±£ÃÜÔ±²Ù×÷ÈÕÖ¾' => '安全保密员操作日志',
218		'ÆäËü' => '其他',
219		'ÏµÍ³¹ÜÀí' => '系统管理',
220		'½Ó¿Ú¹ÜÀí' => '接口管理',
221		'ÈýÔ±¹ÜÀí' => '三员管理',
222		'ÐÂÔö' => '新增',
223		'É¾³ý' => '删除',
224		'ÐÞ¸Ä' => '修改',
225		'±à¼­' => '编辑',
226		'¸ü¸ÄÃÜÂë' => '更改密码',
227		'±£´æ' => '保存',
228		'ÊÖ¶¯Ö´ÐÐ' => '手动执行',
229		'µ¼Èë' => '导入',
230		'¸ß¼¶ËÑË÷' => '高级搜索',
231		'³¬¼¶¹ÜÀí' => '超级管理',
232		'¸´ÖÆ²¢ÐÂÔö' => '复制并新增',
233		'¼¤»î' => '激活',
234		'ÉóºË' => '审核',
235		'²é¿´¹¦ÄÜÈ¨ÏÞ' => '查看功能权限',
236		'ÒÑ½ûÓÃÓÃ»§ÇåÀí' => '已禁用用户清理',
237		'Ìß³ýÓÃ»§' => '踢出用户',
238
239		'ÓÃ»§¹ÜÀí' => '用户管理',
240		'¸ÚÎ»¹ÜÀí' => '岗位管理',
241		'¶ÔËùÓÐÊ¹ÓÃ±¾ÏµÍ³µÄÓÃ»§½øÐÐÓÃ»§ÃûµÇÂ¼¡¢ËùÊô¹¤×÷×é¡¢ÃÜÂëÉèÖÃµÈ¹¤×÷' => '对所有使用本系统的用户进行用户名登录、所属工作组、密码设置等工作',
242		'¶ÔËùÓÐÊ¹ÓÃ±¾ÏµÍ³µÄÓÃ»§½øÐÐÈ¨ÏÞ¹ÜÀí¡£¾ßÌåÀ´Ëµ¾ÍÊÇÃ¿¸öÓÃ»§¿É¶ÔÄÄÐ©Ä£¿é¼°Ä£¿éÄÚµÄÒ³Ãæ½øÐÐ²Ù×÷' => '对所有使用本系统的用户进行权限管理。具体来说就是每个用户可对哪些模块及模块内的页面进行操作',
243		'ÓÉÏµÍ³¹ÜÀíÔ±¶ÔÄ³¸öÓÃ»§µÄÃÜÂë½øÐÐÖØÐÂÉèÖÃ' => '由系统管理员对某个用户的密码进行重新设置',
244		'ÓÉÏµÍ³¹ÜÀíÔ±¶Ô¹¤×÷×é×éÃû¡¢×éÃèÊö¡¢ËùÊô²¿ÃÅ½øÐÐ¶¨Òå£¬¿ÉÌí¼Ó¡¢É¾³ý' => '由系统管理员对工作组组名、组描述、所属部门进行定义，可添加、删除',
245		'¶ÔÓÃ»§½øÐÐ¹¤×÷×éµÄ·ÖÅä¶¨Òå' => '对用户进行工作组的分配定义',
246		'ÓÉÏµÍ³¹ÜÀíÔ±¶ÔÄ³¸öÓÃ»§µÄÃÜÂëÆÚÏÞ½øÐÐÖØÐÂÉèÖÃ' => '由系统管理员对某个用户的密码期限进行重新设置',
247		'ËæÊ±ÏÔÊ¾ÓÃ»§ÔÚÏßÐÅÏ¢¡£°üÀ¨ÓÃ»§Ãû¡¢µÇÂ¼Ê±¼ä¡¢ÀëÏßÊ±¼ä¡¢IPµØÖ·¡¢ÊÇ·ñÔÚÏßµÈ' => '随时显示用户在线信息。包括用户名、登录时间、离线时间、IP地址、是否在线等',
248		'¹¤×÷¸ÚÎ»¶¨Òå' => '工作岗位定义',
249		'ÈËÔ±¹¤×÷¸ÚÎ»Î¬»¤' => '人员工作岗位维护',
250		'¶¨Òå¹¤×÷ÈÕÎÞÌõ¼þ' => '定义工作日无条件',
251		'½«Ö¸¶¨ÓÃ»§ÒÑÓÐÈ¨ÏÞºÍÅäÖÃ¸´ÖÆµ½ÆäËûÓÃ»§' => '将指定用户已有权限和配置复制到其他用户',
252		'×Ô¶¯Ë¢ÐÂÖ´ÐÐºóÌ¨ÈÎÎñ£¬ÒÔÔËÐÐMRP¼Æ»®µÈ' => '自动刷新执行后台任务，以运行MRP计划等',
253		'×Ô¶¨ÒåÉè¼ÆWORDºÍExcelÄ£°å' => '自定义设计WORD和Excel模板',
254		'µ¼³ö' => '导出',
255		'ÐÞ¸ÄÈ¨ÏÞ' => '修改权限',
256		'ÃÜÂëÐÞ¸Ä' => '密码修改',
257		'´¦Àí¶¥¼¶²Ëµ¥Êý¾Ý' => '处理顶级菜单数据',
258		'Ò³Ãæ¶¨ÒåÉú³É' => '页面定义生成',
259		'Ò³Ãæ¹¦ÄÜ¶¨ÒåÉú³É' => '页面功能定义生成',
260		'Éú³ÉÄ£¿é¶¨ÒåÉú³É' => '生成模块定义生成',
261		'¿Í»§¹ÜÀí' => '客户管理',
262		'ÏîÄ¿¹ÜÀí' => '项目管理',
263		'Î¢ÐÅ¹ÜÀí' => '微信管理',
264		'½Ü»ªÌØ' => '捷华特',
265		'Êý¾Ý½á¹¹' => '数据结构',
266		'ÏµÍ³½Ó¿Ú¹ÜÀí' => '系统接口管理',
267	];
268
269	public function __construct()
270	{
271		// 按字符串长度降序排序，确保先匹配长的字符串
272		uasort($this->encodingFixes, function ($a, $b) {
273			return strlen($b) - strlen($a);
274		});
275	}
276
277	/**
278	 * 检测文件编码
279	 */
280	private function detectEncoding($filePath)
281	{
282		$content = file_get_contents($filePath);
283
284		// 尝试检测编码
285		$encodings = ['UTF-8', 'ISO-8859-1', 'GBK', 'GB2312', 'BIG5'];
286
287		foreach ($encodings as $encoding) {
288			if (mb_check_encoding($content, $encoding)) {
289				return $encoding;
290			}
291		}
292
293		return 'UTF-8'; // 默认返回UTF-8
294	}
295
296	/**
297	 * 修复单引号内的乱码内容
298	 */
299	private function fixQuotedContent($content)
300	{
301		// 使用正则表达式匹配单引号内的内容
302		$pattern = "/'([^']*)'/";
303
304		return preg_replace_callback($pattern, function ($matches) {
305			$quotedContent = $matches[1];
306			$fixedContent = $quotedContent;
307
308			// 只在单引号内进行替换
309			foreach ($this->encodingFixes as $wrong => $correct) {
310				// 确保完全匹配整个乱码字符串
311				if ($fixedContent === $wrong) {
312					$fixedContent = $correct;
313					break; // 一旦匹配就停止，避免重复替换
314				}
315			}
316
317			// 如果内容有变化，返回修复后的内容
318			if ($fixedContent !== $quotedContent) {
319				return "'" . $fixedContent . "'";
320			}
321
322			// 如果没有变化，返回原内容
323			return $matches[0];
324		}, $content);
325	}
326
327	/**
328	 * 修复单个SQL文件
329	 */
330	public function fixSqlFile($filePath)
331	{
332		echo "处理文件: $filePath\n";
333
334		// 备份原文件
335		$backupPath = $filePath . '.backup';
336		if (!copy($filePath, $backupPath)) {
337			echo "  错误: 无法创建备份文件\n";
338			return false;
339		}
340
341		// 检测文件编码
342		$encoding = $this->detectEncoding($filePath);
343		echo "  检测编码: $encoding\n";
344
345		// 读取文件内容
346		$content = file_get_contents($filePath);
347
348		// 如果检测到的编码不是UTF-8，尝试转换
349		if ($encoding !== 'UTF-8') {
350			$content = mb_convert_encoding($content, 'UTF-8', $encoding);
351		}
352
353		// 修复单引号内的乱码
354		$originalContent = $content;
355		$content = $this->fixQuotedContent($content);
356
357		// 检查是否有变化
358		if ($content !== $originalContent) {
359			// 统计修复的数量
360			$fixCount = 0;
361			foreach ($this->encodingFixes as $wrong => $correct) {
362				// 统计单引号内的替换次数
363				$pattern = "/'$wrong'/";
364				preg_match_all($pattern, $originalContent, $matches);
365				$fixCount += count($matches[0]);
366			}
367
368			// 保存修复后的文件
369			if (file_put_contents($filePath, $content) !== false) {
370				echo "  成功修复 {$fixCount} 处乱码，原文件已备份为: $backupPath\n";
371				return true;
372			} else {
373				echo "  错误: 无法保存修复后的文件\n";
374				// 恢复备份
375				copy($backupPath, $filePath);
376				return false;
377			}
378		} else {
379			echo "  无需修复\n";
380			// 删除备份文件（如果没有修改）
381			unlink($backupPath);
382			return true;
383		}
384	}
385
386	/**
387	 * 批量修复目录中的所有SQL文件
388	 */
389	public function batchFix($directory = '.')
390	{
391		echo "开始批量修复SQL文件...\n\n";
392
393		$sqlFiles = [];
394
395		// 递归查找所有SQL文件
396		$iterator = new RecursiveIteratorIterator(
397			new RecursiveDirectoryIterator($directory, RecursiveDirectoryIterator::SKIP_DOTS),
398			RecursiveIteratorIterator::SELF_FIRST
399		);
400
401		foreach ($iterator as $file) {
402			if ($file->isFile() && $file->getExtension() === 'sql') {
403				$sqlFiles[] = $file->getPathname();
404			}
405		}
406
407		if (empty($sqlFiles)) {
408			echo "未找到SQL文件\n";
409			return;
410		}
411
412		echo "找到 " . count($sqlFiles) . " 个SQL文件\n\n";
413
414		$successCount = 0;
415		$failCount = 0;
416
417		foreach ($sqlFiles as $sqlFile) {
418			if ($this->fixSqlFile($sqlFile)) {
419				$successCount++;
420			} else {
421				$failCount++;
422			}
423			echo str_repeat("-", 60) . "\n";
424		}
425
426		echo "\n修复完成!\n";
427		echo "成功: $successCount 个文件\n";
428		echo "失败: $failCount 个文件\n";
429	}
430
431	/**
432	 * 检查文件中的乱码（不实际修改）
433	 */
434	public function checkFiles($directory = '.')
435	{
436		echo "检查文件中的乱码问题...\n\n";
437
438		$sqlFiles = [];
439
440		// 递归查找所有SQL文件
441		$iterator = new RecursiveIteratorIterator(
442			new RecursiveDirectoryIterator($directory, RecursiveDirectoryIterator::SKIP_DOTS),
443			RecursiveIteratorIterator::SELF_FIRST
444		);
445
446		foreach ($iterator as $file) {
447			if ($file->isFile() && $file->getExtension() === 'sql') {
448				$sqlFiles[] = $file->getPathname();
449			}
450		}
451
452		if (empty($sqlFiles)) {
453			echo "未找到SQL文件\n";
454			return;
455		}
456
457		$hasIssues = false;
458
459		foreach ($sqlFiles as $sqlFile) {
460			echo "检查文件: $sqlFile\n";
461
462			$content = file_get_contents($sqlFile);
463			$foundIssues = false;
464
465			// 检查单引号内的乱码
466			$pattern = "/'([^']*)'/";
467			preg_match_all($pattern, $content, $matches);
468
469			foreach ($matches[1] as $quotedContent) {
470				foreach ($this->encodingFixes as $wrong => $correct) {
471					if ($quotedContent === $wrong) {
472						echo "  发现乱码: '$wrong' -> 应为: '$correct'\n";
473						$foundIssues = true;
474						$hasIssues = true;
475					}
476				}
477			}
478
479			if (!$foundIssues) {
480				echo "  未发现乱码\n";
481			}
482
483			echo str_repeat("-", 60) . "\n";
484		}
485
486		if (!$hasIssues) {
487			echo "\n所有文件均未发现乱码问题!\n";
488		}
489	}
490}
491
492// 命令行界面
493if (php_sapi_name() === 'cli') {
494	$fixer = new SqlEncodingFixer();
495
496	$options = getopt("d:ch", ["directory:", "check", "help"]);
497
498	if (isset($options['h']) || isset($options['help'])) {
499		echo "SQL文件编码修复工具\n";
500		echo "用法:\n";
501		echo "  php " . basename(__FILE__) . " [选项]\n\n";
502		echo "选项:\n";
503		echo "  -d, --directory <目录>  指定要处理的目录（默认当前目录）\n";
504		echo "  -c, --check            只检查不修改\n";
505		echo "  -h, --help             显示此帮助信息\n\n";
506		echo "示例:\n";
507		echo "  php " . basename(__FILE__) . "                    # 修复当前目录所有SQL文件\n";
508		echo "  php " . basename(__FILE__) . " -d /path/to/sql    # 修复指定目录\n";
509		echo "  php " . basename(__FILE__) . " --check            # 只检查不修改\n";
510		exit(0);
511	}
512
513	$directory = isset($options['d']) ? $options['d'] : (isset($options['directory']) ? $options['directory'] : '.');
514
515	if (isset($options['c']) || isset($options['check'])) {
516		$fixer->checkFiles($directory);
517	} else {
518		$fixer->batchFix($directory);
519	}
520} else {
521	// Web界面
522	echo "<!DOCTYPE html>
523    <html>
524    <head>
525        <title>SQL文件编码修复工具</title>
526        <meta charset='utf-8'>
527        <style>
528            body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; margin: 20px; }
529            .container { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; }
530            .form-group { margin: 15px 0; }
531            label { display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold; }
532            input[type='text'], select { width: 100%; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; }
533            button { background: #007cba; color: white; border: none; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; }
534            button:hover { background: #005a87; }
535            .output { background: #f5f5f5; padding: 15px; border-radius: 4px; margin-top: 20px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: monospace; }
536            .success { color: green; }
537            .error { color: red; }
538        </style>
539    </head>
540    <body>
541        <div class='container'>
542            <h1>SQL文件编码修复工具</h1>
543            <form method='post'>
544                <div class='form-group'>
545                    <label for='directory'>目录路径:</label>
546                    <input type='text' id='directory' name='directory' value='.'>
547                </div>
548                <div class='form-group'>
549                    <label for='action'>操作:</label>
550                    <select id='action' name='action'>
551                        <option value='fix'>修复文件</option>
552                        <option value='check'>只检查不修改</option>
553                    </select>
554                </div>
555                <button type='submit'>执行</button>
556            </form>";
557
558	if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
559		$directory = $_POST['directory'] ?? '.';
560		$action = $_POST['action'] ?? 'fix';
561
562		$fixer = new SqlEncodingFixer();
563
564		ob_start();
565
566		if ($action === 'check') {
567			$fixer->checkFiles($directory);
568		} else {
569			$fixer->batchFix($directory);
570		}
571
572		$output = ob_get_clean();
573
574		echo "<div class='output'>" . htmlspecialchars($output) . "</div>";
575	}
576
577	echo "</div></body></html>";
578}

item.title: Hugo的有关简易教程
item.description:
【Hugo】Hugo + Github 免费部署自己的博客

使用hugo工具生成静态页面，然后在github上部署静态页面，来免费搭建自己的博客

提示

详细请查看链接 【Hugo + Github 免费部署自己的博客】

提示

视频地址 【Hugo + Github免费搭建博客，并实现自动化部署】

Using Hugo page bundles

Page bundles are an optional way to organize page resources within Hugo.

You can opt-in to using page bundles in Hugo Clarity with usePageBundles in your site configuration or in a page's front matter. Read more about usePageBundles.

With page bundles, resources for a page or section, like images or attached files, live in the same directory as the content itself rather than in your static directory.

Hugo Clarity supports the use of leaf bundles, which are any directories within the content directory that contain an index.md file. Hugo's documentation gives this example:

 1content
 2├── about
 3│   ├── index.md
 4├── posts
 5│   ├── my-post
 6│   │   ├── content1.md
 7│   │   ├── content2.md
 8│   │   ├── image1.jpg
 9│   │   ├── image2.png
10│   │   └── index.md
11│   └── my-other-post
12│       └── index.md
13│
14└── another-section
15    ├── ..
16    └── not-a-leaf-bundle
17        ├── ..
18        └── another-leaf-bundle
19            └── index.md
In the above example `content` directory, there are four leaf bundles:

about: This leaf bundle is at the root level (directly under content directory) and has only the index.md.

my-post: This leaf bundle has the index.md, two other content Markdown files and two image files. image1 is a page resource of my-post and only available in my-post/index.md resources. image2 is a page resource of my-post and only available in my-post/index.md resources.

my-other-post: This leaf bundle has only the index.md.

another-leaf-bundle: This leaf bundle is nested under couple of directories. This bundle also has only the index.md.

The hierarchy depth at which a leaf bundle is created does not matter, as long as it is not inside another leaf bundle.

Advantages to using page bundles

The image below is part of the bundle of this page, and is located at content/post/bundle/building.png. Because it's within this page's bundle, the markup for the image only has to specify the image's filename, building.png.

If you ever change the name of the directory in which this Markdown file and the image reside, the reference to the image would not need to be updated.

In addition to more cleanly organizing your content and related assets, when using page bundles, Hugo Clarity will automatically generate markup for modern image formats, which are smaller in file size.

For instance, when you reference an image like building.png, Hugo Clarity will check to see if the same image (based on filename) exists in WebP, AVIF or JXL formats. If you inspect the image above, you'll see a <source> element for building.webp, because that file is also present. Hugo Clarity will only include the markup if these images exist.

Browsers that support these formats and the <picture> element will load them, while browsers that do not will fall-back to the default image. Read more about this process.

Finally, note that page assets can be further managed and refined within the page's front matter if you wish, and are not limited to images alone.

Disadvantages to using page bundles

Page resources in a bundle are only available to the page with which they are bundled — that means you can't include an image with one page and then reference it from another.

Images that are being used in multiple places are more appropriate for your Hugo assets directory. Unlike files in the Hugo static directory, files in the assets directory can be run through Hugo Pipes, which includes image processing.

Emoji Support

Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
